title: 【趣味視頻】ＭＣ樂團演唱會
author: well
txt_content:
在官方論壇上看到的趣味視頻
Rahmschnitzel feat. Gronkh - Kohle Metal

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ObLRD2QwgW4

http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XMjgzMDg5MTky/v.swf

以下是歌詞英文翻譯……沒啥意義，就是在唱煤礦……

►►► Song and Video by Rahmschnitzel, Lyrics by Gronkh, animated with Cinema4D.

Even though the lyrics of this song are not that "meaningful" you can read them below (Thanks to LUTTF for translating).
All of the spoken and sung words are taken from the "Let's Play Minecraft" videos by Gronkh:

Coal coal coal (4x)
Cool coal lalala
Cool coal tralala
Coal coal coal (4x)
Coal coal schupdidu
coal coal

Uaaaaaaahh!

Oh wow look. A new coal video by Gronkh.

Coal, oooooh, coal!

Well, concearning coal...
well, I've fortunately never mentioned that this map is full of coal.
That's a dream!

Tralalalalalala tralala tralala
Tralalalalalala cholera
Tralalalalalala tralala tralala
Tralalalalalala
Okay, it's alright.

(Cow Solo!!)

Ehm. We gonna take this coal, too
Because I am a old mineralwhore...
There's still coal.

So!

Tralalalalalala tralala tralala
Tralalalalalala Cholera
Tralalalalalala tralala tralala
Tralalalalalala

Wuuaaaeeehhh

Coal coal coal (4x)
Cool coal lalala
Cool coal
Hihihaha

replies.author: kk08923
replies.txt_content: 那个僵尸乐团吓死我了，我还以为蜘蛛会出现！！！

replies.author: kk08923
replies.txt_content:
还真是“牛”B啊！！！
那个作者不知道有一种东西叫做CHARCOAL（木炭）吗？？？
把原木炼制了就可以啦。。。。。

replies.author: hsf1357
replies.txt_content: 难道MC在跟风龚琳娜的《忐忑》不成？世风日下啊......

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
呃, 今天才發現, 有人動作比我快, 早發了相同的視頻, 抱歉抱歉~~.
不過我多放了歌詞上來, 應該不算完全重複吧... 
下次轉發這種官方論壇上面, 大家都看得到的帖子, 真該多注意注意...
